package com.oops;

public class StaticKeyword {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Game obj1=new Game();
		Game obj2=new Game();
		obj1.show(123, "warner");
		obj2.show(212, "virat");
		obj1.display();
		obj2.display();

	}

}
class Game
{
	int score;
	String name;
	static String game="cricket";
	
	public void show(int i,String str)
	{
		score=i;
		name=str;
	}
	static void change()
	{
		game="footbal";
	}
	public void display()
	{
		System.out.println(score+""+name+""+game);
	}
}
